did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Marty Ferrell Xavier University Library Photographs
did.physdesc: 0 linear feet (27 digital image files, 2.3 gigabytes)
did.abstract: Digital images of Xavier University Library staff at events such as the President's Reception, retirement parties, and wedding showers taken primarily by former librarian Marty Ferrell.

bioghist.head: Biography of Marty Ferrell
bioghist.p: Marty Ferrell began working at Xavier University Library in 1985. She was the collection development librarian and retired in 2017 as the head of collection services.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection contains twenty-seven digital images of Xavier University Library staff at events such as the President's Reception, retirement parties, and wedding showers from 1990-2007. The majority of the photographs were taken by Marty Ferrell while she was a library employee. One photograph shows Ferrell receiving an award from Michael Graham, SJ, President, Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Several capture the interior of the Conaton Board Room in Schmidt Hall when it was used as the Lodge Learning Lab.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Photographs have not been arranged beyond the order in which they were received from the donor.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: XUA-27, Xavier University Library Records, University Archives, Xavier University, Cincinnati, Ohio

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: University Archives staff digitized original 4" x 6" photographic prints using an Epson Expression 12000XL. Originals were returned to the donor in August 2017. The collection contains only the digital surrogates.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. Access to materials is by appointment only. Digital use copies of electronic records in this collection can only be accessed onsite in University Archives. Contact University Archives staff to schedule an appointment to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: This collection is the physical property of Xavier University. Copyright law of the United States governs the reproduction of copyrighted material. The user assumes full responsibility for the fair use of materials requested in total compliance with the copyright law of the United States that may arise through the use of any requested materials.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Number, XUA-94, Marty Ferrell Xavier University Library Photographs, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.
